channel.title: PNPC help

item.title: PNPC help
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

Neither of these work.

if (playerEquipment[playerAmulet] == 8004) { //Skeleton Amulet npcId = 94; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

[code]if (command.startsWith(“pnpc”) && playerRights >= 2) {
try {
int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

                if (newNPC <= 30000 && newNPC >= 0) {
                    npcId = newNPC;
                    isNpc = true;
                    updateRequired = true;
                    appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                } else {
                    sendMessage("No such P-NPC.");
                }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pnpc #");
            }
        } [/code]

Why don’t any of these work?

Read full topic
